Our Executive Chairman, and fearless leader, Manuel "Manny" Stotz has launched his own telegram channel, @manuelstotz.

Follow to hear the latest on his views on $TON, Web3, the future of the digital continent, why he's building TON Strategy Co, what he believes crypto can do for the masses, and much much more!

Marking a new chapter, as of today, September 2, 2025, we're rebranding to TON Strategy Co. and our ticker changes to $TONX from $VERB.

Our mission remains the same â€” to build the premier $TON treasury by accumulating, staking, and holding $TON. Follow us for updates and upcoming developments.
